mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lostNotice (lostNum, crewCode, lostContent, lostTitle, lostCreated, lostHitCount) VALUES (lostNotice_seq.NEXTVAL, #{crewCode}, #{lostContent}, #{lostTitle}, SYSDATE, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE lostNotice SET lostContent = #{lostContent}, lostTitle = #{lostTitle} WHERE lostNum = #{lostNum}
mapper.select: SELECT lostNum, crewCode, lostContent, lostTitle, lostCreated, lostHitCount FROM lostNotice
